actions.text: Amendment SA 25 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 29.
Amendment SA 25 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S1104; text: CR S1104) To strike supplemental staff funding available only to a limited number of Senators in a time of sequestration.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 25 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 29.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 25 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 29.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 25 proposed by Senator Paul.

purpose: To strike supplemental staff funding available only to a limited number of Senators in a time of sequestration.
